channel.title: DeltaScape dropping disabled
channel.description: Hi. Why DeltaScape has disabled items dropping for admins or owners? And how to make it able to drop items? And btw ::emtpy doesn't even seems to work :P

item.title: DeltaScape dropping disabled
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

The reason is, is becuase: Admins will drop things which are illegal for guests. Then guests can pick them up.
Dropitem.java, it should say something like:

if (c.playerRights >= 2) {
c.sendMessage("Admins can't drop!");

If its not that, its your config.java class.
You will see the rest then.

Edit: Please tell me DeltaScape isn’t a Delta base?

Read full topic
